installationGuide.title: Step-by-Step Installation Guide
installationGuide.subtitle: Quick installation in minutes
installationGuide.appBlockDescription: NusenseTryOn now uses only an app block compatible with Online Store 2.0 themes. Vintage themes must be updated to an OS 2.0 theme to enjoy the full experience.
installationGuide.step1Description: In your Shopify admin, go to Apps in the side menu, then click on App Store. Search for "NusenseTryOn" and click "Add App".
installationGuide.step1NoteText: Authorize the requested permissions (read and modify products and themes) so the app can function properly.
installationGuide.step2Title: Add the App Block (Online Store 2.0 Themes)
installationGuide.step2Description: The app block is placed directly in your product page sections. It is compatible with all Online Store 2.0 themes.
installationGuide.step2Instruction1: In the theme editor, open a product page
installationGuide.step2Instruction2: Click Add Block in the desired section
installationGuide.step2Instruction3: In the Apps category, select "NUSENSE Try-On Button"
installationGuide.step2Instruction4: Customize the button text, style, and other settings
installationGuide.step2Instruction5: Rearrange the block by dragging if necessary, then click Save
installationGuide.step2ImportantText: App blocks are available only on Online Store 2.0 themes (JSON templates). Update your theme if necessary.
installationGuide.step2QuickAccessText: Click the button below to open the theme editor directly on a product page.
installationGuide.step2RestrictedText: Please select a pricing plan to access this feature.
installationGuide.step3Description: The app banner automatically displays on your homepage to promote the virtual try-on feature. It is compatible with all Online Store 2.0 themes.
installationGuide.step3Instruction1: In the theme editor, open the homepage (index template)
installationGuide.step3Instruction2: Click Theme Settings (gear icon) at the bottom left
installationGuide.step3Instruction3: In the App Integrations section, search for "NUSENSE Try-On Banner"
installationGuide.step3Instruction4: Enable the banner by checking the corresponding box
installationGuide.step3Instruction5: The banner will automatically appear on your homepage. Click Save
installationGuide.step3TipText: The banner can be disabled at any time via theme settings without removing the integration. Visitors can also close it, and their preference will be remembered for the session.
installationGuide.step3QuickAccessText: Click the button below to open the theme editor directly on the homepage.
installationGuide.step3RestrictedText: Please select a pricing plan to access this feature.
installationGuide.step4Description: Visit your homepage and a product page of your store to verify that the banner and virtual try-on button appear correctly. Click on the elements to test the functionality.
installationGuide.step4CongratulationsText: NusenseTryOn is now configured. Your customers can use the virtual try-on feature directly on your product pages and discover the feature via the banner on your homepage.
